title: Relates to notification procedures for the transfer of a child from one foster home to another
summary: Relates to notification procedures for the transfer of a child from one foster home to another; permits transfer without prior notice in certain circumstances.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the family court act and the social services law, in relation to notification of the court, the parties and the attorney for the child, when a child protective or foster care agency transfers a child from one foster home or other foster care placement to another
